Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using brain cytosol and synaptic membranes.

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased binding to synaptic membranes compared to wild-type alpha-synuclein
Readout description.Result Description: The mutant protein NM_000345.6:c.1391G>A showed increased binding to synaptic membranes.

Readout description.Conclusion: Decreased binding to synaptic membranes compared to wild-type alpha-synuclein
Readout description.Result Description: The mutant protein NM_000345.6:c.1170A>T showed decreased binding to synaptic membranes.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding of wild-type alpha-synuclein to synaptic membranes greater than 80%

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding of mutant protein to synaptic membranes less than 50%
